doc.field: Mattie E. Hewitt & Richard A. Smith photograph collection
Mattie E. Hewitt & Richard A. Smith photograph collection

Series II. Negatives consists of 8x10 film negatives made by both Mattie Hewitt and Richard Smith. There are negatives for only a fraction of the prints included in the collection. They are arranged alphabetically by assignment, following the arrangement of the prints. Within each assignment, they are arranged numerically according to the negative number assigned by the photographer.
Mattie E. Hewitt & Richard A. Smith photograph collection
